Seagate One Touch Hub 10TB External Hard Disk Drive

The Seagate One Touch Hub 10TB is a Desktop External Drive with Hub that gives you the storage and connectivity you need to save your most precious files in a password-protected desktop form factor. With the Seagate One Touch Hub 10TB External Hard Disk Drive, you have enough space to save and back up your most important files. The front of the drive features USB Type-A and Type-C ports, allowing you to connect and charge a wide range of devices such as your smartphone even when your computer is off. You can easily edit, organize, store, and share photos with a four-month complimentary membership to the Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan. Seagate One Touch Hub 16TB Type-C External HDD

The Seagate One Touch Hub Type-C External HDD is excellent for both personal and business use thanks to its impressive 16TB storage capacity, which provides plenty of room for large volumes of data. The front-facing USB-C and USB 3.0 ports on this external hard drive improve usability and accessibility. USB 3.2 Type-A and Type-C ports ensure compatibility with a broad range of devices and systems, further bolstering connectivity. The drive provides adaptable and effective data transfer options by supporting Micro-USB 3.0/3.1/3.2 Gen 1 system connections. The Seagate One Touch Hub 16TB Type-C External HDD has 256-bit AES hardware-based encryption to safeguard your private information, making security a top priority. This guarantees that if the drive is lost or stolen, your information will be safe. Additionally, users can easily and dependably back up their data with the Seagate Toolkit Backup Software that comes pre-installed on the drive. Because it works with both Windows and macOS, this software is a flexible tool for a variety of operating systems. To ensure consistent and dependable performance, the Seagate One Touch Hub 16TB Type-C External HDD needs to be powered by an AC adapter. With an additional layer of security provided by its password protection feature, users can feel secure knowing that their data is protected from unwanted access.
